sect2.title: Installation
sect2.para:
Two Installation approaches should be tested:
Manual Install by downloading all tird-party software
Installation from update site
Upgrade from update site

sect2.title: GUI
sect2.para:
GUI should be verified against:
Eclipse User Interface Guidelines Version 2.1
JBoss Tools GUI Guidlines (should be written)

sect2.title: Functional
sect2.para: Every functional requirement is represented by JIRA issue in JBIDE JIRA project. Functional requirement should be obtained from issue description field.
